name: Chess 2: Meme's, Elephants, Monkeys
description:
Hey this is my first game ever, wild. I spent about 36 hours on this having never done any kind of game programming, only the very light Minecraft modding way back in 2011 and wow, its a real game. Mechanics inspired by Oats Jenkins brought to life. Single player only at the moment, so force your brother/sister/friend/mom/dad/cat to sit at your pc and play with you.

There's several bugs atm I can't quite get out: Multiplayer is broken, the are music glitches, game doesn't full screen properly. The music toggle is a bitt fiddley, sometime sit resets when you open the settings back up and you can still make the piece move sound from in the settings.
